author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie Send on by return my music as I am getting in a piano and want the music for Xmas: the present of a diminutive plum-pudding I thank you for. I am setting about (with the aid of the Director, Francini) the translation into Italian of ‘Celibates’ for a big publisher in Florence. I have been taking German lessons for the past month and have made good progress. I am tight for money as I have bought a new suit. Jim
